page.title: 17A school day
page.content: The bell rings loudly through the school, Summoning everyone to their classrooms for registration,a daily ritual. When assembly is over We rush,well walk,or relunctantly amble along to our lessons Occasionally we have a visit from Peanuts the school cat. Who,like a school inspector Prowls around examining the classroom If all is well she'll give a regal wave with her tail And disappear into the corridor Lunch is the best lesson of the day Except when you're on duty, Ticking off names,checking dirty hands. Then again, Lunch is the second best lesson, Going home beats all.
